channel.title: tweets on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in tweets on Barefoot Rob

item.title: evs
item.description: 11:21 Tuesday 08 December 2015 JST I turned on MOOVs while walking to Kawasaki station Travis gave me some nice insight/feedback on docker There are currently four (4) docker VMs on my machine I may update the tutorial to use letsencrypt on DH I’m headed to work now to work on CB and AB sites I’d love to move them to docker containers, but not sure how / if Good Idea ™ Mika asked if I know any teachers in 二子玉川 area, so I emailed Eda.
